# [Interview #1182: Harold Washington Library Center-AU Tour, Entry #37](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1182#37)

#### Question

I wanted to ask you about the Sleepless, if anyone will see them again?

#### Brandon Sanderson
